author: DottieMay 1, 2019
review: There have been some improvements in a few areas. The min. requirements for some features have gone down, available gifts in the lobby have increased. Often the challenges are unrealistic and you dont always get your prize. Tech issues are a constant problem and support often doesn't answer. Too man...Full ReviewThere have been some improvements in a few areas. The min. requirements for some features have gone down, available gifts in the lobby have increased. Often the challenges are unrealistic and you dont always get your prize. Tech issues are a constant problem and support often doesn't answer. Too many players couldn't complete the album . Cards were impossible for many, no matter what. The best thing about this game are the many other players who all (mostly) band together to help one another.

author: Vonda PaytonApril 16, 2019
review: Revised 4/15/19 Lately Slotomania wants me to claim my prizes by connecting to Facebook. I'm opposed to, and strongly resent this 'strong arm' tactic! Connecting to any social media should be optional, not mandatory! I spend down time playing your game, not on social media. I do not want to collect ...Full ReviewRevised 4/15/19 Lately Slotomania wants me to claim my prizes by connecting to Facebook. I'm opposed to, and strongly resent this 'strong arm' tactic! Connecting to any social media should be optional, not mandatory! I spend down time playing your game, not on social media. I do not want to collect my gifts from Facebook nor should I have to. If there are no other options for me to collect my gifts I may as well delete this game and find another one.!

review: There have been some improvements in a few areas. The min. requirements for some features have gone down, available gifts in the lobby have increased. Often the challenges are unrealistic and you dont always get your prize. Tech issues are a constant problem and support often doesn't answer. Too man...Full ReviewThere have been some improvements in a few areas. The min. requirements for some features have gone down, available gifts in the lobby have increased. Often the challenges are unrealistic and you dont always get your prize. Tech issues are a constant problem and support often doesn't answer. Too many players couldn't complete the album . Cards were impossible for many, no matter what. The best thing about this game are the many other players who all (mostly) band together to help one another.

author: Seana HillMarch 4, 2019
review: Auto spin is a joke. there's a pop up about Facebook or a level up or an ad for a deal in the store every few seconds. Other casino/slots games have these, but they go away on their own in a second or two, and your auto spins continue. This one stops everything till you touch "OK" or close out the p...Full ReviewAuto spin is a joke. there's a pop up about Facebook or a level up or an ad for a deal in the store every few seconds. Other casino/slots games have these, but they go away on their own in a second or two, and your auto spins continue. This one stops everything till you touch "OK" or close out the pop up, rendering auto spin useless. You can't set your phone down or look away for any amount of time because the game just haults all spinning till you acknowledge the pop up.

review: the payouts have been very dissapointing as of late, especially playing the Robin hood game. they make that game part of the sloto quest and you have to win so much money in free spins.... well it cost me 10million in coins, all i had in my account and i didnt even get a bonus round. several times p...Full Reviewthe payouts have been very dissapointing as of late, especially playing the Robin hood game. they make that game part of the sloto quest and you have to win so much money in free spins.... well it cost me 10million in coins, all i had in my account and i didnt even get a bonus round. several times playing wild horses ive had all 3 bonus symbols appear and it did not activate. not to mention the game somehow loses connection on wifi... i think i might be done for a while.

author: Christy WilliamsApril 23, 2019
review: Be prepared to spend lots of money for this "free" game. The games themselves are a lot of fun, but if you win anything, they take right back. You either have to wait for bonuses, or buy tokens to keep playing. And don't think for a second that buying tokens makes it easier to win. Once you start bu...Full ReviewBe prepared to spend lots of money for this "free" game. The games themselves are a lot of fun, but if you win anything, they take right back. You either have to wait for bonuses, or buy tokens to keep playing. And don't think for a second that buying tokens makes it easier to win. Once you start buying tokens, you keep buying them. So not worth it.

review: Im a level 2400 and it WAS great, until the whole new social thing. I think is stinks. A lot of us play to relax, definitely not to socialize. I play it to be alone and at peace. Also it's pretty screwed up I finally complete a quest on difficult and finish a tournament in 2nd ppl mace which is hard...Full ReviewIm a level 2400 and it WAS great, until the whole new social thing. I think is stinks. A lot of us play to relax, definitely not to socialize. I play it to be alone and at peace. Also it's pretty screwed up I finally complete a quest on difficult and finish a tournament in 2nd ppl mace which is hard and both times receive duplicate Ace cards that I didn't need. it seems like this company is just money hungry to me. Also what's the point in Gems just for quests? I miss the Heroes.

author: Skalde SuraaMay 4, 2019
review: Better than most. I enjoy the different slots and types of slots, and the card collect and bingo feature. I really like that I can uninstall specific slots I dont like. What makes me stop at 4 stars though is this ridiculous snakes and ladders game. Personally I hate the whole board game idea becaus...Full ReviewBetter than most. I enjoy the different slots and types of slots, and the card collect and bingo feature. I really like that I can uninstall specific slots I dont like. What makes me stop at 4 stars though is this ridiculous snakes and ladders game. Personally I hate the whole board game idea because board games are more of a little kid thing, but of all the ones you could choose you chose the most boring and monotonous one of them all. I will be so glad when that ends.

author: Zedar 2March 4, 2019
review: Popups galore, greedy "free" slots. If you like multiple, repeated popups offering to sell you chips, spins, etc. at stoopid prices then this is the app for you. I counted 9 popups in 25 auto spins. The payouts are tiny and you lose lose lose so you have the privilege of responding to those popups a...Full ReviewPopups galore, greedy "free" slots. If you like multiple, repeated popups offering to sell you chips, spins, etc. at stoopid prices then this is the app for you. I counted 9 popups in 25 auto spins. The payouts are tiny and you lose lose lose so you have the privilege of responding to those popups and wasting money on a game that doesn't pay. This preloaded app is utter garbage.

author: LadybugsPicnic one2IIIApril 24, 2019
review: After downloading and opening the app, the bombardment begins. Never ending pop ups. The reels stick and don't stop when you press the stop button, and I've noticed that when you actually use a time booster, the pop ups interrupt the gameplay and chew up the time. I gave this game a go, and now I'm ...Full ReviewAfter downloading and opening the app, the bombardment begins. Never ending pop ups. The reels stick and don't stop when you press the stop button, and I've noticed that when you actually use a time booster, the pop ups interrupt the gameplay and chew up the time. I gave this game a go, and now I'm uninstalling it - the games are okay but it's like being at a casino with an annoying nosy parker constantly looking over your shoulder and asking for change while you're playing. OFF PUTTING.

author: Christina HunterMay 5, 2019
review: I've been playing this game since November 2015 and I'm really considering uninstalling and not investing anymore money at this point! I've spent a lot of REAL MONEY to win nothing! Anything I win big is gone immediately. You get roped in with a small win, thinking it will continue only to receive a...Full ReviewI've been playing this game since November 2015 and I'm really considering uninstalling and not investing anymore money at this point! I've spent a lot of REAL MONEY to win nothing! Anything I win big is gone immediately. You get roped in with a small win, thinking it will continue only to receive a rude awakening that it's gone. It's a rip off, there are never any real good wins and what you do win goes so quickly. The price of the packages continue to increase and it's just not worth it. Steady going downhill! I'm honestly sick when I've went back and calculated how much money I've actually invested into this game for NOTHING! I've never received any type of credits for being a faithful player and "investor" or anything. I'm over it!

So much so that you may get one block the same in the first three reels, but hardly ever, if ever on the fourth and fifth reels. Just a few allow consistent winning.

review: Purely designed to take your dollars and they do not care HOW they do it . Biggest Con job going , don't spend any money on this rip off game . No point in complaining they come up with a random numerator and your just having a run of Bad Luck . They take coins from your account , hoping you won't n...Full ReviewPurely designed to take your dollars and they do not care HOW they do it . Biggest Con job going , don't spend any money on this rip off game . No point in complaining they come up with a random numerator and your just having a run of Bad Luck . They take coins from your account , hoping you won't notice it , then just ignore you when you complain . . Never got so Angry playing a computer game. Mind blowing how greedy  Sloto is.  As you can see below Playtika have responded to my review , but thats basically all they do. Every complaint /I've lodge basically gets the same response , We are sorry , we know how you feel , you are just having a run of bad luck it will change soon , have a nice day . Coins disappearing from one's account is not bad luck , playing the wheel of stars and every time get the lowest or 2nd lowest prize , reward or whatever you want to call it is not bad luck , receiving cards from purchases constantly are repeats after repeats is not bad luck , entering challenges where in the sloto games free spins all but disappear making it impossible to the .complete challenge. When you increase your bet , if your lucky to get free spins , it pays less . Run out space

author: Christopher WalshMay 14, 2019
review: Slotomania should now be "Free to Try" not "Free to Play." They are losing players years of loyalty, fast. Since Heroes: 1. You can expect a 98% loss on your "15 ways to get coins." 1. Daily dashes are mostly unachievable from Gold Status+. 2. Dead spins have increased. 3. Purchase screens have incr...Full ReviewSlotomania should now be "Free to Try" not "Free to Play." They are losing players years of loyalty, fast. Since Heroes: 1. You can expect a 98% loss on your "15 ways to get coins." 1. Daily dashes are mostly unachievable from Gold Status+. 2. Dead spins have increased. 3. Purchase screens have increased, and are more invasive. 4. Ace Packs are extremely Rare for Gold Status+. 5. Clans reward low levels and punish higher levels. 6. Prices increase with every purchase made. Expect Duplicates.

author: Christopher WalshMay 14, 2019
review: Slotomania should now be "Free to Try" not "Free to Play." They are losing players years of loyalty, fast. Since Heroes: 1. You can expect a 98% loss on your "15 ways to get coins." 1. Daily dashes are mostly unachievable from Gold Status+. 2. Dead spins have increased. 3. Purchase screens have incr...Full ReviewSlotomania should now be "Free to Try" not "Free to Play." They are losing players years of loyalty, fast. Since Heroes: 1. You can expect a 98% loss on your "15 ways to get coins." 1. Daily dashes are mostly unachievable from Gold Status+. 2. Dead spins have increased. 3. Purchase screens have increased, and are more invasive. 4. Ace Packs are extremely Rare for Gold Status+. 5. Clans reward low levels and punish higher levels. 6. Prices increase with every purchase made. Expect Duplicates.

review: after NUMEROUS issues, items earned but not recieved, features not loading etc, id get an email from their support a few days later, while nice and cheerful, it ended with them blaming anything they could come up with. They claimed i was using an out of date version, even tho it had been reloaded th...Full Reviewafter NUMEROUS issues, items earned but not recieved, features not loading etc, id get an email from their support a few days later, while nice and cheerful, it ended with them blaming anything they could come up with. They claimed i was using an out of date version, even tho it had been reloaded that morning. Generally zero effort to make things right even with screen shot evidence. also WAAYYYYYYYYYYY to many popups. Started out a fun game, their lack of concern and greed destroyed it.

review: Describes itself as the "#1 Free Slot Machine Game", and yet it is listed in here as the #2 Top Grossing game..... The games are good, I do like playing when I can, but I soon run out of coins, and t...Full ReviewDescribes itself as the "#1 Free Slot Machine Game", and yet it is listed in here as the #2 Top Grossing game..... The games are good, I do like playing when I can, but I soon run out of coins, and the challenges are virtually impossible unless you have plenty of coins. Not a very level playing field unfortunately :-(

review: Far too many popups after the game has loaded, virtual money doesn't last long, if you want to buy virtual money the price is extortionate for so little, wins are few and far between to make it a worthwhile experience, 5-star cards are impossible unless you buy money, therefore for those people that...Full ReviewFar too many popups after the game has loaded, virtual money doesn't last long, if you want to buy virtual money the price is extortionate for so little, wins are few and far between to make it a worthwhile experience, 5-star cards are impossible unless you buy money, therefore for those people that don't buy money, it's impossible to finish your album, the ACE cards free spin 99% of the time will give you money.

review: such a scam. $18 for ten turns on a slot. ads to buy chips constantly and they aren't good. i went bankrupt one time and they offered to sell me the cops i had an hour before for ten dollars!!!! ten dollars for an hour of play time. they literally want you to pay them a higher salary to play their g...Full Reviewsuch a scam. $18 for ten turns on a slot. ads to buy chips constantly and they aren't good. i went bankrupt one time and they offered to sell me the cops i had an hour before for ten dollars!!!! ten dollars for an hour of play time. they literally want you to pay them a higher salary to play their game than a lot of people even make. If I Do Occasionally Win, It's Gone In Few Hours & Again No Wins!

author: Melisa HardyMay 11, 2019
review: USED to be fun app. Now if you're lucky enough to get coins through bonuses to play it takes them all. They put up ways to get more coins like Daily Dash, Snakes and Ladders or Blasts but then make it impossible to reach the goals. And forget about completing albums, you'll never collect all the car...Full ReviewUSED to be fun app. Now if you're lucky enough to get coins through bonuses to play it takes them all. They put up ways to get more coins like Daily Dash, Snakes and Ladders or Blasts but then make it impossible to reach the goals. And forget about completing albums, you'll never collect all the cards needed. I've played this for a long time and never had these kinds of problems. AVOID THIS GAME!!! Find another one that gives you a chance to play.

author: Cali RochaApril 21, 2019
review: I love the balanced game odds, it's boring to ALWAYS win (in small amounts). much prefer the excitement of winning bigger amounts maybe a little less often. also love the perks/boosters, etc that keep it from getting monotonous. update 4/20/19: enjoying the new games and new features. still loving t...Full ReviewI love the balanced game odds, it's boring to ALWAYS win (in small amounts). much prefer the excitement of winning bigger amounts maybe a little less often. also love the perks/boosters, etc that keep it from getting monotonous. update 4/20/19: enjoying the new games and new features. still loving this game. Would prefer to hit a jackpot more often. have hit a couple smaller ones but have yet to hit a big one. I have been playing for years, but consistently for about 6 mos.

They are so far from basics and so expensive !

review: WHAT A RIP OFF!!!!! Played and advanced to Rapid Fire. Had 22,000 in coins and was spinning with 162 FREE SPINS. Played and advanced to Rapid Fire. Had 22,000 in coins and was spinning with 162 FREE SPINS. So far so good, the 100+ wins were coming in regular (every 3 or 4 spins), and 25 free spins were going up and up, PLUS I had 85% on the 15,000 coin accumulator, I just selected 100 Automatic Spins WHEN half way through the turn it flickered off, respun the wheels and went to Select Another Machine. Results.. I lost everything I had worked hours on accumulating.. felt so peed off...

review: The games are very tight, maybe one big win and then nothing nothing nothing. The featured slots are garbage, even a "winning line" is an 8th of your bet. Also, I've been playing slots for ...Full ReviewThe games are very tight, maybe one big win and then nothing nothing nothing. The featured slots are garbage, even a "winning line" is an 8th of your bet. All you get is duplicates for the cards you need to collect, and if you spend money-be prepared to lose worse. Also, I've been playing slots for 20 years, so yes Playtika-I know it's chance. But with this slot, the player doesn't even have that.

author: Jax RieckMarch 21, 2019
review: The games are very tight, maybe one big win and then nothing nothing nothing. The featured slots are garbage, even a "winning line" is an 8th of your bet. All you get is duplicates for the cards you need to collect, and if you spend money-be prepared to lose worse. I sit at level 4144 and a Sapphire player. Game play and everything else is awesome, but they do know how to wack you with store prices, and daily bonuses are small to. if you get decent amount of money saved up and it takes it all with just a short few spins cant really even get dashes done, because there alittle hard with out money to play. And i buy alot from the store. *cough* $125.00 a month. wont be doing that again.

author: Tim BeautoMarch 4, 2019
review: Popups galore, greedy "free" slots. If you like multiple, repeated popups offering to sell you chips, spins, etc. at stoopid prices then this is the app for you. I counted 9 popups in 25 auto spins. The payouts are tiny and you lose lose lose so you have the privilege of responding to those popups a...Full ReviewPopups galore, greedy "free" slots. If you like multiple, repeated popups offering to sell you chips, spins, etc. at stoopid prices then this is the app for you. I counted 9 popups in 25 auto spins. The payouts are tiny and you lose lose lose so you have the privilege of responding to those popups and wasting money on a game that doesn't pay. This preloaded app is utter garbage.

author: Jonathan TremblayApril 18, 2019
review: Once you run out of chips, it is extremeley difficult to complete daily tasks and recieve rewards. I ran out around level 300 without spending a dime, but once I ran out of chips and didnt want to spend real money the game came across as disgenuine, as at least a real slot machine pays out, in this ...Full ReviewOnce you run out of chips, it is extremeley difficult to complete daily tasks and recieve rewards. I ran out around level 300 without spending a dime, but once I ran out of chips and didnt want to spend real money the game came across as disgenuine, as at least a real slot machine pays out, in this case investing or risking real money seems silly yet the developers seem to aim to do so.

author: Christina HunterMay 5, 2019
review: I've been playing this game since November 2015 and I'm really considering uninstalling and not investing anymore money at this point! I've spent a lot of REAL MONEY to win nothing! Anything I win big is gone immediately. You get roped in with a small win, thinking it will continue only to receive a...Full ReviewI've been playing this game since November 2015 and I'm really considering uninstalling and not investing anymore money at this point! I've spent a lot of REAL MONEY to win nothing! Anything I win big is gone immediately. You get roped in with a small win, thinking it will continue only to receive a rude awakening that it's gone. It's a rip off, there are never any real good wins and what you do win goes so quickly. The price of the packages continue to increase and it's just not worth it. Steady going downhill! I'm honestly sick when I've went back and calculated how much money I've actually invested into this game for NOTHING! author: A Google userFebruary 24, 2019
review: definitely fun with constant interesting changes, however, my only complaint is the overly obvious change in game odds after ammasing a few million. Specifically, i play Medusa Magic often, and after i win a few million, the game changes drastically. i can roll 300 times w only minor wins, as oppose...Full Reviewdefinitely fun with constant interesting changes, however, my only complaint is the overly obvious change in game odds after ammasing a few million. Specifically, i play Medusa Magic often, and after i win a few million, the game changes drastically. i can roll 300 times w only minor wins, as opposed to random jackpots on the way up. i understand players need to lose it all to be motivated to purchase, but the game odds could be adjusted a little more subtle. LOL... i finally made purchase!

author: Daniel GordonMay 23, 2019
review: Had this game for a long time yes they bring out new features they bring out new slots but unless your buying the 100$ packs it's pointless daily dashes are impossible sloto clans are stupid if you don't get the key you get 2 million coins even though I can collect 7.5 million every 2 hours so you w...Full ReviewHad this game for a long time yes they bring out new features they bring out new slots but unless your buying the 100$ packs it's pointless daily dashes are impossible sloto clans are stupid if you don't get the key you get 2 million coins even though I can collect 7.5 million every 2 hours so you wait aweek to get 2 million. You write to support they send a scripted reply with 0 interest in there players, wins are non-existent there for you can't get clan points this game isn't about luck at all

review: the new update has totally screwed up my game on my phone. i cant get in anymore. keeps telling me oops error occured try again. i was still debating if i liked the new clans feature...it takes alot of clan points to advance from 1 chest to the next for me...but now with the log in issues i cant eve...Full Reviewthe new update has totally screwed up my game on my phone. i cant get in anymore. keeps telling me oops error occured try again. i was still debating if i liked the new clans feature...it takes alot of clan points to advance from 1 chest to the next for me...but now with the log in issues i cant even get in to play. seriously disappointed with Slotomania these days...with all the money you want us to spend the game shouldn't have glitches and hiccups like this.

review: After playing for years, I'm done with this app. It's impossible to get anywhere when I get $1million every three hours but to play any of the higher games, I have to bet $2mil or more each spin. The slotoquests are impossible and...Full ReviewAfter playing for years, I'm done with this app. It's impossible to get anywhere when I get $1million every three hours but to play any of the higher games, I have to bet $2mil or more each spin. Now with the clan stuff instead of the animal bonuses, I get nothing. The slotoquests are impossible and the prizes aren't worth it. It's just not fun anymore. I have to collect coins for a week without playing, only to get about 3 minutes of game play. 1 extra star because customer service is good.

review: was fun but they changed it and unless you pay money to play you achieve nothing. a lot of side games to get involved in to play - cost lots of coins- not a straight slot game more of a cult group game. need friends to play to send you coins to play so you dont have to buy them. i like to play on my...Full Reviewwas fun but they changed it and unless you pay money to play you achieve nothing. a lot of side games to get involved in to play - cost lots of coins- not a straight slot game more of a cult group game. need friends to play to send you coins to play so you dont have to buy them. i like to play on my own so it is costly without friends sending u coins to play. if u want straight slots go elsewhere. this is not the place for just slots it is a cult group game that has gone down the drain - BEWARE

author: LadybugsPicnic one2IIIApril 24, 2019
review: After downloading and opening the app, the bombardment begins. Never ending pop ups. The reels stick and don't stop when you press the stop button, and I've noticed that when you actually use a time booster, the pop ups interrupt the gameplay and chew up the time. I gave this game a go, and now I'm ...Full ReviewAfter downloading and opening the app, the bombardment begins. Never ending pop ups. The reels stick and don't stop when you press the stop button, and I've noticed that when you actually use a time booster, the pop ups interrupt the gameplay and chew up the time. I gave this game a go, and now I'm uninstalling it - the games are okay but it's like being at a casino with an annoying nosy parker constantly looking over your shoulder and asking for change while you're playing. OFF PUTTING.

author: didi ReissMay 29, 2019
review: This game cheats. it removes over a billion tokens from one time I play to the next. At other times, it 'miscounts' the roll of the die. The die says one number but the game moves me a different number. If I have 8 free spins, somehow I wind up with only 7. But mostly, it removes tokens from one tim...Full ReviewThis game cheats. it removes over a billion tokens from one time I play to the next. At other times, it 'miscounts' the roll of the die. The die says one number but the game moves me a different number. If I have 8 free spins, somehow I wind up with only 7. But mostly, it removes tokens from one time to the next. I wasn't sure at first but then I started taking screen shots. Big cheaters. Don't pay for anything.

review: Obviously rigged. Playing easy level in the quest. One requirement to pass the level is spin 12 free spins. I have spun over 400 spins and have not got one free spin. One requirement to pass the level is spin 12 free spins. I have spun over 400 spins and have not got one free spin. No way that happens even with the odds unless it is rigged. Every other slot game U have played has been fair in free spins and bonus games unlike this one. Designed to make money at ridiculous prices. 40 bucks for one extra spin on bonus wheel!! It's outrageous. Don't spend your money, it's a scam.

review: This game used to be fun but now it isn't. For the last few months I've consistently lost coins and I've played every slot game they have available and every game is taking my coins. I know I'm playing against a computer or whatever but there is something fishy going on. My mom had over 200Billion c...Full ReviewThis game used to be fun but now it isn't. For the last few months I've consistently lost coins and I've played every slot game they have available and every game is taking my coins. I know I'm playing against a computer or whatever but there is something fishy going on. My mom had over 200Billion coins and I had 20Billion and now we both have under 1Billion coins to play with.. Don't waste your time downloading this game and it takes up all of your gigs on your phone

author: Skalde SuraaMay 4, 2019
review: Better than most. I enjoy the different slots and types of slots, and the card collect and bingo feature. I really like that I can uninstall specific slots I dont like. What makes me stop at 4 stars though is this ridiculous snakes and ladders game. Personally I hate the whole board game idea becaus...Full ReviewBetter than most. I enjoy the different slots and types of slots, and the card collect and bingo feature. I really like that I can uninstall specific slots I dont like. What makes me stop at 4 stars though is this ridiculous snakes and ladders game. Personally I hate the whole board game idea because board games are more of a little kid thing, but of all the ones you could choose you chose the most boring and monotonous one of them all. I will be so glad when that ends.

author: Deborah ParsonMay 5, 2019
review: Spent lots over several days/months/years. When you win, the payouts become non existent. if you buy the expensive lotto package and get a big payout, the slots go ice cold. I reloaded after a break and things are the same or even worse. The clan stuff is annoying, constant Facebook annoying. I don'...Full ReviewSpent lots over several days/months/years. When you win, the payouts become non existent. if you buy the expensive lotto package and get a big payout, the slots go ice cold. I reloaded after a break and things are the same or even worse. The clan stuff is annoying, constant Facebook annoying. I don't have Facebook, and if I did, I would never share with friends that I got 5 10's and didn't even get my bet back. So done now. They are so far from basics and so expensive !

review: got this game so i can earn actual money on the lucky miner app, and for that purpose id recommend this slots game because you can just auto spin with a tiny bet amout, and as long as you look every few minutes in case you have you have to click something, youll pretty much be earning real money whi...Full Reviewgot this game so i can earn actual money on the lucky miner app, and for that purpose id recommend this slots game because you can just auto spin with a tiny bet amout, and as long as you look every few minutes in case you have you have to click something, youll pretty much be earning real money while just letting it play itself, but thats only in combination with the lucky miner app, other than that though, im sure youd be able to find a much better slot machine app than this.not terrible tho.

author: AnnaMarie GarciaMay 10, 2019
review: Slotomania used to be alot of fun. so many different game types really made it fun. However over the last year or so its really changed. It seems to all be simply aimed purely at forcing us to spend more and buy buy buy. And if you dont sspend enough you find yourself all but completely shut down on...Full ReviewSlotomania used to be alot of fun. so many different game types really made it fun. However over the last year or so its really changed. It seems to all be simply aimed purely at forcing us to spend more and buy buy buy. And if you dont sspend enough you find yourself all but completely shut down on all the games, unable to move anywhere but down. It is sad because they do have alot of great games. Just my two cents!

And if you dont sspend enough you find yourself all but completely shut down on...Full ReviewSlotomania used to be alot of fun. so many different game types really made it fun. However over the last year or so its really changed. It seems to all be simply aimed purely at forcing us to spend more and buy buy buy. And if you dont sspend enough you find yourself all but completely shut down on all the games, unable to move anywhere but down. It is sad because they do have alot of great games. Just my two cents!

Don't waste your time downloading this game and it takes up all of your gigs on your phone

author: Christina HunterMay 5, 2019
review: I've been playing this game since November 2015 and I'm really considering uninstalling and not investing anymore money at this point! I've spent a lot of REAL MONEY to win nothing! Anything I win big is gone immediately. You get roped in with a small win, thinking it will continue only to receive a...Full ReviewI've been playing this game since November 2015 and I'm really considering uninstalling and not investing anymore money at this point! I've spent a lot of REAL MONEY to win nothing! Anything I win big is gone immediately. You get roped in with a small win, thinking it will continue only to receive a rude awakening that it's gone. It's a rip off, there are never any real good wins and what you do win goes so quickly. The price of the packages continue to increase and it's just not worth it. Steady going downhill! I'm honestly sick when I've went back and calculated how much money I've actually invested into this game for NOTHING! I've never received any type of credits for being a faithful player and "investor" or anything. I'm over it!

The constant problems is one reason my wife and I stopped playing Sloto for a long time and found another site. These problems seem to be very common to this site, which is a disappointment.

review: Slotomania is one of the games that will always be on whatever mobile device I own. There's almost always some form of "extras" promo going on to be able to play without spending a lot of real cash. The only complaint I have is this new pause that happens when one gets five of a kind. The spin butto...Full ReviewSlotomania is one of the games that will always be on whatever mobile device I own. There's almost always some form of "extras" promo going on to be able to play without spending a lot of real cash. The only complaint I have is this new pause that happens when one gets five of a kind. The spin button is unavailable to press for an extra 3 to 5 seconds while the "share" button is on screen. Just started with the newest update and I really dislike it.

Played and advanced to Rapid Fire. Had 22,000 in coins and was spinning with 162 FREE SPINS. So far so good, the 100+ wins were coming in regular (every 3 or 4 spins), and 25 free spins were going up and up, PLUS I had 85% on the 15,000 coin accumulator, I just selected 100 Automatic Spins WHEN half way through the turn it flickered off, respun the wheels and went to Select Another Machine. Results.. I lost everything I had worked hours on accumulating.. felt so peed off...

author: DottieMay 1, 2019
review: There have been some improvements in a few areas. The min. requirements for some features have gone down, available gifts in the lobby have increased. Often the challenges are unrealistic and you dont always get your prize. Tech issues are a constant problem and support often doesn't answer. Too man...Full ReviewThere have been some improvements in a few areas. The min. requirements for some features have gone down, available gifts in the lobby have increased. Often the challenges are unrealistic and you dont always get your prize. Tech issues are a constant problem and support often doesn't answer. Too many players couldn't complete the album . Cards were impossible for many, no matter what. The best thing about this game are the many other players who all (mostly) band together to help one another.

WHAT HAPPENED SLOTMANIA? All of a sudden free spins & bonus hits on the slot machines (& I mean ALL machines!) has lengthened to the point you go through BILLIONS of virtual coins & NOT GET ONE HIT ON THE FREE SPINS OR THE BONUS FEATURE! & if/when you do get one of the features, the % of the payouts aren't in ratio to the MILLIONS & BILLIONS of "virtual coins" players PURCHASE TO PLAY! THE FUN OF PLAYING SLOTS IS TO "HIT" THE FREE COINS OR FEATURE!

Daily dashes are mostly unachievable from Gold Status+. 2. Dead spins have increased. 3. Purchase screens have incr...Full ReviewSlotomania should now be "Free to Try" not "Free to Play." They are losing players years of loyalty, fast. Since Heroes: 1. You can expect a 98% loss on your "15 ways to get coins." 1. Daily dashes are mostly unachievable from Gold Status+. 2. Dead spins have increased. 3. Purchase screens have increased, and are more invasive. 4. Ace Packs are extremely Rare for Gold Status+. 5. Clans reward low levels and punish higher levels. 6. Prices increase with every purchase made. Expect Duplicates.

review: was fun but they changed it and unless you pay money to play you achieve nothing. a lot of side games to get involved in to play - cost lots of coins- not a straight slot game more of a cult group game. need friends to play to send you coins to play so you dont have to buy them. i like to play on my...Full Reviewwas fun but they changed it and unless you pay money to play you achieve nothing. a lot of side games to get involved in to play - cost lots of coins- not a straight slot game more of a cult group game. need friends to play to send you coins to play so you dont have to buy them. i like to play on my own so it is costly without friends sending u coins to play. if u want straight slots go elsewhere. this is not the place for just slots it is a cult group game that has gone down the drain - BEWARE

review: The higher you climb, the less you win, and higher store prices as well. I sit at level 4144 and a Sapphire player. Game play and everything else is awesome, but they do know how to wack you with store prices, and daily bonuses are small to. if you get decent amount of money saved up and it takes it...Full ReviewThe higher you climb, the less you win, and higher store prices as well. I sit at level 4144 and a Sapphire player. Game play and everything else is awesome, but they do know how to wack you with store prices, and daily bonuses are small to. if you get decent amount of money saved up and it takes it all with just a short few spins cant really even get dashes done, because there alittle hard with out money to play. And i buy alot from the store. *cough* $125.00 a month. wont be doing that again.

author: DottieMay 1, 2019
review: There have been some improvements in a few areas. The min. requirements for some features have gone down, available gifts in the lobby have increased. Often the challenges are unrealistic and you dont always get your prize. Tech issues are a constant problem and support often doesn't answer. Too man...Full ReviewThere have been some improvements in a few areas. The min. requirements for some features have gone down, available gifts in the lobby have increased. Often the challenges are unrealistic and you dont always get your prize. Tech issues are a constant problem and support often doesn't answer. Too many players couldn't complete the album . Cards were impossible for many, no matter what. The best thing about this game are the many other players who all (mostly) band together to help one another.

review: doesn't seem to land 0n point combos very often...for those of us that can't afford to spend money on them ( at least initially ) would be fun and encouraging to see more wins, makes sense, get really excited because you're winning more often, no matter the amount of winnings, then you feel like sti...Full Reviewdoesn't seem to land 0n point combos very often...for those of us that can't afford to spend money on them ( at least initially ) would be fun and encouraging to see more wins, makes sense, get really excited because you're winning more often, no matter the amount of winnings, then you feel like sticking around, also not going to submit my credit card for a few dollars....if we win more often and more points/cash then maybe we would feel more inclined to spend a little on our credit cards...

review: Spent lots over several days/months/years. When you win, the payouts become non existent. if you buy the expensive lotto package and get a big payout, the slots go ice cold. The clan stuff is annoying, constant Facebook annoying. I don't have Facebook, and if I did, I would never share with friends that I got 5 10's and didn't even get my bet back. So done now. They are so far from basics and so expensive !

author: Christina HunterMay 5, 2019
review: I've been playing this game since November 2015 and I'm really considering uninstalling and not investing anymore money at this point! I've spent a lot of REAL MONEY to win nothing! Anything I win big is gone immediately. You get roped in with a small win, thinking it will continue only to receive a...Full ReviewI've been playing this game since November 2015 and I'm really considering uninstalling and not investing anymore money at this point! I've spent a lot of REAL MONEY to win nothing! Anything I win big is gone immediately. You get roped in with a small win, thinking it will continue only to receive a rude awakening that it's gone. It's a rip off, there are never any real good wins and what you do win goes so quickly. The price of the packages continue to increase and it's just not worth it. Steady going downhill! I'm honestly sick when I've went back and calculated how much money I've actually invested into this game for NOTHING! I've never received any type of credits for being a faithful player and "investor" or anything. I'm over it!

I've played other slot games and I get so much more. Also, there are too many ads to make purchases. Most of the payouts are very low. I also don't ever have the opportunity to finish the bonus games. The game is fixed so you're not able to win the prize.

author: Melisa HardyMay 11, 2019
review: USED to be fun app. Now if you're lucky enough to get coins through bonuses to play it takes them all. They put up ways to get more coins like Daily Dash, Snakes and Ladders or Blasts but then make it impossible to reach the goals. And forget about completing albums, you'll never collect all the car...Full ReviewUSED to be fun app. Now if you're lucky enough to get coins through bonuses to play it takes them all. They put up ways to get more coins like Daily Dash, Snakes and Ladders or Blasts but then make it impossible to reach the goals. And forget about completing albums, you'll never collect all the cards needed. I've played this for a long time and never had these kinds of problems. AVOID THIS GAME!!! Find another one that gives you a chance to play.

author: Katy BarkerMay 18, 2019
review: Slotomania is one of the games that will always be on whatever mobile device I own. There's almost always some form of "extras" promo going on to be able to play without spending a lot of real cash. The only complaint I have is this new pause that happens when one gets five of a kind. The spin butto...Full ReviewSlotomania is one of the games that will always be on whatever mobile device I own. There's almost always some form of "extras" promo going on to be able to play without spending a lot of real cash. The only complaint I have is this new pause that happens when one gets five of a kind. The spin button is unavailable to press for an extra 3 to 5 seconds while the "share" button is on screen. Just started with the newest update and I really dislike it.

author: Christina HunterMay 5, 2019
review: I've been playing this game since November 2015 and I'm really considering uninstalling and not investing anymore money at this point! I've spent a lot of REAL MONEY to win nothing! Anything I win big is gone immediately. You get roped in with a small win, thinking it will continue only to receive a...Full ReviewI've been playing this game since November 2015 and I'm really considering uninstalling and not investing anymore money at this point! I've spent a lot of REAL MONEY to win nothing! Anything I win big is gone immediately. You get roped in with a small win, thinking it will continue only to receive a rude awakening that it's gone. It's a rip off, there are never any real good wins and what you do win goes so quickly. The price of the packages continue to increase and it's just not worth it. Steady going downhill! I'm honestly sick when I've went back and calculated how much money I've actually invested into this game for NOTHING! I've never received any type of credits for being a faithful player and "investor" or anything. I'm over it!

author: Andrea SchnellApril 21, 2019
review: Thoroughly disgusted with this game! I think RNG stands for "rigged number generator" not "random number generator." I don't hear back from customer support until tournaments, quests, or bonus games have already ended, and they tell me that I am experiencing "visual glitches," which would be conside...Full ReviewThoroughly disgusted with this game! I think RNG stands for "rigged number generator" not "random number generator." I don't hear back from customer support until tournaments, quests, or bonus games have already ended, and they tell me that I am experiencing "visual glitches," which would be considered false advertising anywhere else. I finally completed the first blast all season and had 178 billion in coins, quest took it all the next day, because of technical issues. Won't get back before end

review: A lot of great slots and fun bonus rounds. A bit of pressure to buy their "packages" (for additional coins) but overall pretty great for free play. Updating my rating 05/17/2019: Winnings used to be great and was able to play for long periods of time. The game has incorporated "clans" wanting you to...Full ReviewA lot of great slots and fun bonus rounds. A bit of pressure to buy their "packages" (for additional coins) but overall pretty great for free play. Updating my rating 05/17/2019: Winnings used to be great and was able to play for long periods of time. The game has incorporated "clans" wanting you to play as a team. Bonuses are now rare and play time is minutes as I never have enough chips to play.

Too man...Full ReviewThere have been some improvements in a few areas. The min. requirements for some features have gone down, available gifts in the lobby have increased. Often the challenges are unrealistic and you dont always get your prize. Tech issues are a constant problem and support often doesn't answer. Too many players couldn't complete the album . Cards were impossible for many, no matter what. The best thing about this game are the many other players who all (mostly) band together to help one another.

review: I played this game for awhile. Had great fun, was almost at gold, my "Hero's" were at Level 3. Daily Challenges seem ...Full ReviewI played this game for awhile. Had great fun, was almost at gold, my "Hero's" were at Level 3. Finally linked it to Facebook and it reset me to the beginning of silver and reset my Hero's to level 1. They apologized and gave me a few coins. It took billions to get where I was. Daily Challenges seem to be set to the old level. Having a hard time completing them. Used almost all my coins trying to do the dailies. Very disappointing. First game I linked to FB won't be doing that again.

Finally linked it to Facebook and it reset me to the beginning of silver and reset my Hero's to level 1. They apologized and gave me a few coins. It took billions to get where I was. Daily Challenges seem ...Full ReviewI played this game for awhile. Had great fun, was almost at gold, my "Hero's" were at Level 3. Finally linked it to Facebook and it reset me to the beginning of silver and reset my Hero's to level 1. They apologized and gave me a few coins. It took billions to get where I was. Daily Challenges seem to be set to the old level. Having a hard time completing them. Used almost all my coins trying to do the dailies. Very disappointing. First game I linked to FB won't be doing that again.

review: I started playing w long time ago and the games were fun but unfortunately Slotomania/Playtika have ruined the fun. Always wanting you to buy coins for the game. I don't understand why anyone would purchase coins for a game that doesn't payout real money. The Qwest are ridiculous, the cards are ridi...Full ReviewI started playing w long time ago and the games were fun but unfortunately Slotomania/Playtika have ruined the fun. Always wanting you to buy coins for the game. I don't understand why anyone would purchase coins for a game that doesn't payout real money. The Qwest are ridiculous, the cards are ridiculous. Don't even get me started about customer service... I've sent at least 10 emails regarding the game not working properly, payout is wrong and I have been waiting 3 months for a reply!

author: Rebecca PMay 15, 2019
review: After playing for years, I'm done with this app. It's impossible to get anywhere when I get $1million every three hours but to play any of the higher games, I have to bet $2mil or more each spin. Now with the clan stuff instead of the animal bonuses, I get nothing. The slotoquests are impossible and...Full ReviewAfter playing for years, I'm done with this app. It's impossible to get anywhere when I get $1million every three hours but to play any of the higher games, I have to bet $2mil or more each spin. Now with the clan stuff instead of the animal bonuses, I get nothing. The slotoquests are impossible and the prizes aren't worth it. It's just not fun anymore. I have to collect coins for a week without playing, only to get about 3 minutes of game play. 1 extra star because customer service is good.

author: Tonya AragonApril 22, 2019
review: This game has many options to play and keeps me entertained for hours! What I don't listen that it really doesn't pay out when you get a bonus and if you happen to get a bonus, it's taken so many coins and time to get one. Also, there's a summon mode thats supposed to add up wilds during a time limi...Full ReviewThis game has many options to play and keeps me entertained for hours! What I don't listen that it really doesn't pay out when you get a bonus and if you happen to get a bonus, it's taken so many coins and time to get one. Also, there's a summon mode thats supposed to add up wilds during a time limit and it doesn't run through the whole time, shorting collection by minutes. Not good since it takes hours to try again.

author: Veronica AveryMay 25, 2019
review: For the past 3 days...starting May 22, I have not received my coins for getting '5 of a kind' in any game..when '5 of a kind' comes up and I want to share, Slotomania hangs up and I have to go out and back in. This has been happening since May 22 and I have received quite a lot of '5 of a kinds'. author: John Z.May 5, 2019
review: Graphics, themes, and different music for each slot machine are great! Unfortunately payouts are almost non-existent. This could be an awesome slot machine game if pay outs were at least fair. Bet small so you can enjoy the graphics but don't expect to win anything. Also, take note that if you downl...Full ReviewGraphics, themes, and different music for each slot machine are great! Unfortunately payouts are almost non-existent. This could be an awesome slot machine game if pay outs were at least fair. Bet small so you can enjoy the graphics but don't expect to win anything. Also, take note that if you download every slot machine, it takes up about a GB of storage space.

author: Dave MasonApril 18, 2019
review: Despite being constantly inundated with ads begging you to buy coins, it's a lot of fun ... at first. Then, you recognize the hook ... the games let you win extraordinary amounts taking me over 160M coins and then the next day, taking it all back at the same extraordinary rate with plenty of "buy mo...Full ReviewDespite being constantly inundated with ads begging you to buy coins, it's a lot of fun ... at first. Then, you recognize the hook ... the games let you win extraordinary amounts taking me over 160M coins and then the next day, taking it all back at the same extraordinary rate with plenty of "buy more coins" ads. When I bought more coins, then suddenly the luck returned ... very suspicious. I live in Las Vegas and can tell you the win algorithms would never be allowed here. I fold.

review: been playing for 4+ yrs. they're always adding new games to keep you involved. new challenges to on top of the games makes it fun & exciting. now they've added a new challenge "clan teams" we'll see how it works out. the negative of Clan team, if you don't reach your weekly goal is you can't collect...Full Reviewbeen playing for 4+ yrs. they're always adding new games to keep you involved. new challenges to on top of the games makes it fun & exciting. now they've added a new challenge "clan teams" we'll see how it works out. the negative of Clan team, if you don't reach your weekly goal is you can't collect your personal reward. And I see people kicking others out of Clans as well. maybe this can be fixed at some point.

author: Amber SixberryMarch 28, 2019
review: Was a great app to play. My favorite thing about the game were the quests, but now you only run them maybe once or twice a month. This discourages me from playing and spending money in the app. Please bring back the quests more often, or create an app that runs quests all the time. You are the only ...Full ReviewWas a great app to play. My favorite thing about the game were the quests, but now you only run them maybe once or twice a month. This discourages me from playing and spending money in the app. Please bring back the quests more often, or create an app that runs quests all the time. You are the only app who has the quests. It's not worth it to play and keep the app downloaded on my phone if the best part of your app is missing.

author: Savage5O3April 19, 2019
review: 4 *'s Overall. Absolutely a fun game, always new features or events going on, making things exciting again. the only flaws are when you cant get Bonuses or Big Wins when you are betting above a certain amount. Example. if I'm betting 25-50Million, it may or may not go into one of these non paying mo...Full Review4 *'s Overall. Absolutely a fun game, always new features or events going on, making things exciting again. the only flaws are when you cant get Bonuses or Big Wins when you are betting above a certain amount. Example. if I'm betting 25-50Million, it may or may not go into one of these non paying modes (But will immediately give you either/or when you decrease your bet by a lot) Example. if I was previously betting 25-50Mil but reduce to 1-2.5Mil, it almost never fails to hit immediately.

author: Rebecca PMay 15, 2019
review: After playing for years, I'm done with this app. It's impossible to get anywhere when I get $1million every three hours but to play any of the higher games, I have to bet $2mil or more each spin. Now with the clan stuff instead of the animal bonuses, I get nothing. The slotoquests are impossible and...Full ReviewAfter playing for years, I'm done with this app. It's impossible to get anywhere when I get $1million every three hours but to play any of the higher games, I have to bet $2mil or more each spin. Now with the clan stuff instead of the animal bonuses, I get nothing. The slotoquests are impossible and the prizes aren't worth it. It's just not fun anymore. I have to collect coins for a week without playing, only to get about 3 minutes of game play. 1 extra star because customer service is good.

Updating my rating 05/17/2019: Winnings used to be great and was able to play for long periods of time. The game has incorporated "clans" wanting you to play as a team. author: Christopher WalshMay 14, 2019
review: Slotomania should now be "Free to Try" not "Free to Play." They are losing players years of loyalty, fast. Since Heroes: 1. You can expect a 98% loss on your "15 ways to get coins." 1. Daily dashes are mostly unachievable from Gold Status+. 2. Dead spins have increased. 3. Purchase screens have incr...Full ReviewSlotomania should now be "Free to Try" not "Free to Play." They are losing players years of loyalty, fast. Since Heroes: 1. You can expect a 98% loss on your "15 ways to get coins." 1. Daily dashes are mostly unachievable from Gold Status+. 2. Dead spins have increased. 3. Purchase screens have increased, and are more invasive. 4. Ace Packs are extremely Rare for Gold Status+. 5. Clans reward low levels and punish higher levels. 6. Prices increase with every purchase made. Expect Duplicates.

author: Kelly WirthMay 16, 2019
reply:
PlaytikaDecember 23, 2018Thank you Kelly  for your message.
I am sorry about your experience.
In our pursuit to innovate and improve there are chances that we can run into unexpected technical issues. We appreciate your patience in this matter and I'm happy to announce that this concern has been addressed and you should be good to go :) Let us know how it goes!
review: Keeping the game fresh must be a challenge and they're doing the best they can. Some of the new changes are not so great (clans, unrealistic contests and daily goals). Big wins are so much harder to come by now which is making it less fun than before.

Also, take note that if you download every slot machine, it takes up about a GB of storage space.

author: Patricia WhiteMay 15, 2019
review: was fun but they changed it and unless you pay money to play you achieve nothing. a lot of side games to get involved in to play - cost lots of coins- not a straight slot game more of a cult group game. need friends to play to send you coins to play so you dont have to buy them. i like to play on my...Full Reviewwas fun but they changed it and unless you pay money to play you achieve nothing. a lot of side games to get involved in to play - cost lots of coins- not a straight slot game more of a cult group game. need friends to play to send you coins to play so you dont have to buy them. i like to play on my own so it is costly without friends sending u coins to play. if u want straight slots go elsewhere. this is not the place for just slots it is a cult group game that has gone down the drain - BEWARE

author: peggy sozaMay 18, 2019
review: A lot of great slots and fun bonus rounds. A bit of pressure to buy their "packages" (for additional coins) but overall pretty great for free play. Updating my rating 05/17/2019: Winnings used to be great and was able to play for long periods of time. The game has incorporated "clans" wanting you to...Full ReviewA lot of great slots and fun bonus rounds. A bit of pressure to buy their "packages" (for additional coins) but overall pretty great for free play. Updating my rating 05/17/2019: Winnings used to be great and was able to play for long periods of time. The game has incorporated "clans" wanting you to play as a team. Bonuses are now rare and play time is minutes as I never have enough chips to play.

author: David WatsonMay 17, 2019
review: WHAT A RIP OFF!!!!! Played and advanced to Rapid Fire. Had 22,000 in coins and was spinning with 162 FREE SPINS. Played and advanced to Rapid Fire. Had 22,000 in coins and was spinning with 162 FREE SPINS. So far so good, the 100+ wins were coming in regular (every 3 or 4 spins), and 25 free spins were going up and up, PLUS I had 85% on the 15,000 coin accumulator, I just selected 100 Automatic Spins WHEN half way through the turn it flickered off, respun the wheels and went to Select Another Machine. Results.. I lost everything I had worked hours on accumulating.. felt so peed off...

author: Michelle SausanavitchMay 17, 2019
review: Was enjoying the game. Now I have had multiple problems. Dont get payouts. Have lost gems without using them. Had a ton to play with until I started the sloto quest. Game freezes all the time. Gave my email and have app downloaded. Get the emails but wont work for my phone and dont know y. But remem...Full ReviewWas enjoying the game. Now I have had multiple problems. Dont get payouts. Have lost gems without using them. Had a ton to play with until I started the sloto quest. Game freezes all the time. Gave my email and have app downloaded. Get the emails but wont work for my phone and dont know y. But remember Lucy promises no junk or spam emails. The free spins are getting lower and lower on payout. Lose prizes when site freezes. Had so much to play with and now I can barely play. Ready to uninstall.

author: Jeanne MillimanApril 24, 2019
review: love this game but only giving a three star. The dash points are great but having the last dash for a golden card set at 11000 Club points was really mean. Especially when purchases for playing were already made. When a dash for that many points is required the Club points for that 24 hour period sh...Full Reviewlove this game but only giving a three star. The dash points are great but having the last dash for a golden card set at 11000 Club points was really mean. Especially when purchases for playing were already made. When a dash for that many points is required the Club points for that 24 hour period should be counted or longer period of time given. Still love the game just get frustrated.

author: Susan ThurstonApril 11, 2019
review: Kind of hard to have fun and enjoy the big wins when I'm not getting the total amount that I won. I am shorted 2-5 million every big win and then the machines don't allow you win any more, spin after spin I win very little or nothing at all. And sloto cards are non-existant.....really hard to get it...Full ReviewKind of hard to have fun and enjoy the big wins when I'm not getting the total amount that I won. I am shorted 2-5 million every big win and then the machines don't allow you win any more, spin after spin I win very little or nothing at all. And sloto cards are non-existant.....really hard to get it's just duplicts when you do get some. It seems to get worse with each update you get. This site is going straight to hell, not really fun anymore.

author: Troy SkeltonMay 11, 2019
review: Far too many popups after the game has loaded, virtual money doesn't last long, if you want to buy virtual money the price is extortionate for so little, wins are few and far between to make it a worthwhile experience, 5-star cards are impossible unless you buy money, therefore for those people that...Full ReviewFar too many popups after the game has loaded, virtual money doesn't last long, if you want to buy virtual money the price is extortionate for so little, wins are few and far between to make it a worthwhile experience, 5-star cards are impossible unless you buy money, therefore for those people that don't buy money, it's impossible to finish your album, the ACE cards free spin 99% of the time will give you money.

author: julia aguilarMay 6, 2019
review: Used to love this game. Have made purchases here and there but it is really difficult to complete anything. The daily dash payouts are way less than you have to play in order to reach them. Never am able to complete all card sets. Can only finish the snake ladders if I'm in the high billions of coin...Full ReviewUsed to love this game. Have made purchases here and there but it is really difficult to complete anything. The daily dash payouts are way less than you have to play in order to reach them. Never am able to complete all card sets. Can only finish the snake ladders if I'm in the high billions of coins, which is rare. I get it, it's like gambling so losing coins is inevitable, but all the extra bonuses are practically impossible.

review: it's a fun game, when you can play. I UNDERSTAND that you're not always going to win, but I honestly feel that the losing goes on way to LONG. When I say losing, I mean almost every spin is a loss. It's not that you go up and down and end up running out of coins...i mean almost every spin is a compl...Full Reviewit's a fun game, when you can play. I UNDERSTAND that you're not always going to win, but I honestly feel that the losing goes on way to LONG. When I say losing, I mean almost every spin is a loss. It's not that you go up and down and end up running out of coins...i mean almost every spin is a complete zero or not even half of your bet. I could understand a cycle of ups and downs but I've been in a down cycle for about 3 weeks now of nothing but losing, it's not fun anymore when it's that long.

Played and advanced to Rapid Fire. Had 22,000 in coins and was spinning with 162 FREE SPINS. So far so good, the 100+ wins were coming in regular (every 3 or 4 spins), and 25 free spins were going up and up, PLUS I had 85% on the 15,000 coin accumulator, I just selected 100 Automatic Spins WHEN half way through the turn it flickered off, respun the wheels and went to Select Another Machine. Results.. I lost everything I had worked hours on accumulating.. felt so peed off...

I would like to play but the constant thought that the game will freeze or pull up the spinning circle de...Full ReviewTrying to play and the only thing that opens is any option to buy coins. The circle in the middle of the screen spins for multiple minutes before any option opens and then it's the wrong option. I would like to play but the constant thought that the game will freeze or pull up the spinning circle deters us. The constant problems is one reason my wife and I stopped playing Sloto for a long time and found another site. These problems seem to be very common to this site, which is a disappointment.

You'll loose your coins fast. Wait 3-4 hrs. The game got reall bad, after new owners in 2016.

Daily dashes are mostly unachievable from Gold Status+. 2. Dead spins have increased. 3. Purchase screens have incr...Full ReviewSlotomania should now be "Free to Try" not "Free to Play." Dead spins have increased. 3. Purchase screens have increased, and are more invasive. 4. Ace Packs are extremely Rare for Gold Status+. 5. Clans reward low levels and punish higher levels. 6. Prices increase with every purchase made. Expect Duplicates.

review: This game is still trash. You still either have to pay to win, or you have to spend several hours a day playing to win. And now, because of my bad review before, I don't win period, all my "special bonus" wins are the lowest they have. It used to be a decent game, now it lags, has problems connectin...Full ReviewThis game is still trash. You still either have to pay to win, or you have to spend several hours a day playing to win. And now, because of my bad review before, I don't win period, all my "special bonus" wins are the lowest they have. It used to be a decent game, now it lags, has problems connecting, if you win anything big it freezes up for up to 5 minutes, and it'll glitch in the middle of a spin and reset its odds that you worked so hard to get in your favor and give you no win or a low one.

review: I have quit playing the quests because even in the easy one it is almost impossible to win. Pretty sure they want you to use all your coins so you'll maybe buy more. Don't get caught up in buying because if there is a glitch and a billing mistake occurs, they will NOT make it right or fix it. They w...Full ReviewI have quit playing the quests because even in the easy one it is almost impossible to win. Pretty sure they want you to use all your coins so you'll maybe buy more. Don't get caught up in buying because if there is a glitch and a billing mistake occurs, they will NOT make it right or fix it. They will, however, come up with all kinds of reasons to not make it right and they will string you along for months while saying they appreciate your support and want happy players.
